scripts.build_with_gulp: cd _gulp_setup && npm i &&  npm run build1 && npm run build2
scripts.build_with_parcel: cd _parcel_setup && npm i && npm run build
scripts.build_with_rollup: cd _rollup_setup && npm i && npm run build1 && npm run build2
scripts.build_with_webpack: cd _webpack_setup && npm i && npm run build
scripts.build_with_other: cd __other_setup && npm i && npm run build
